_header: Of a true love clean and derne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Off A trewe loue clene & derneIchaue I write þe a
                    Ron…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat to þe siht of þi swete faceOn domes day we
                    may come tille
